item.description:
Learn all about 4s and strengths, defenses, limitations. Learn about all the subtypes of 4, personal growth strategies, relationship dynamics in relationship to 4s. Great to attend if you are in relationship with a 4 or just want to be more like a 4.

Herb Pearce, M.Ed Counseling, is an Enneagram expert, having taught 2000 workshops on the Enneagram. He is a therapist for individuals, couples and families, a personal coach, and the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737

7:30 pm - 9:30 pm

($40 - Sliding scale to $20)
item.name: Type 4, Depth Seeker, Workshop - also, How to Relate to 4s
